title: I’m Not Used to It, But....
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>There there, well done, you always work so hard, huh, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Huh? You’re all stiffened up.... What’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, I’m sorry. Umm.... My sister isn’t really that kind of person, so I just wasn’t used to getting praised....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Is that so? My pats are popular with my sisters, Kanata-chan, and Kasumi-chan, you know? It’s okay, there’s no need to be afraid!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Then, may I receive it one more time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Sure! There, there~ Good girl, good girl~♪ How was it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I feel.... really fulfilled....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ahaha. It doesn’t have that big of an effect~. But now I want to do it to you more, good girl, good girl!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I may get addicted to this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
